<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_snc_datasilos.DataSilosGetConfig</api_name><caller_access>1</caller_access><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>The DataSilosGetConfig is called by the DataSilos extension point instance class and returns the config object with all relevant changes and additions.</description><name>DataSilosGetConfig</name><script><![CDATA[function DataSilosGetConfig(config)
{
	config['tables']['incident'] =
	{
		'scope': 'x_snc_datasilos',
		'active': true,
		'avoid_expensive_queries': false,
		'columns':
		{
			'instant_access':
			{
				'sys_user': ''
			},
			'whitelist_trigger':
			{
				'sys_user_group': ''
			},
		}
	};
	
	config['tables']['incident_task'] =
	{

		'active': true,
		'avoid_expensive_queries': false,
		'columns':
		{
			'instant_access':
			{
				'sys_user': ''
			},
			'whitelist_trigger':
			{
				'sys_user_group': ''
			},
		}
	};
	
	config['tables']['change_request'] =
	{
		'scope': 'x_snc_datasilos',
		'active': true,
		'avoid_expensive_queries': false,
		'columns':
		{
			'instant_access':
			{
				'sys_user': ''
			},
			'whitelist_trigger':
			{
				'sys_user_group': ''
			},
		}
	};
	
	config['tables']['change_task'] =
	{
		'scope': 'x_snc_datasilos',
		'active': true,
		'avoid_expensive_queries': false,
		'columns':
		{
			'instant_access':
			{
				'sys_user': ''
			},
			'whitelist_trigger':
			{
				'sys_user_group': ''
			},
		}
	};
	
	config['tables']['problem'] =
	{
		'scope': 'x_snc_datasilos',
		'active': true,
		'avoid_expensive_queries': false,
		'columns':
		{
			'instant_access':
			{
				'sys_user': ''
			},
			'whitelist_trigger':
			{
				'sys_user_group': ''
			},
		}
	};
	
	config['tables']['problem_task'] =
	{
		'scope': 'x_snc_datasilos',
		'active': true,
		'avoid_expensive_queries': false,

		{

			{

			},
		}
	};
	
	config['tables']['sc_request'] =
	{
		'scope': 'x_snc_datasilos',
		'active': true,
		'avoid_expensive_queries': false,
		'columns':
		{
			'instant_access':
			{
				'sys_user': ''
			},
			'whitelist_trigger':
			{
				'sys_user_group': ''
			},
		}
	};
	
	config['tables']['sc_req_item'] =
	{
		'scope': 'x_snc_datasilos',
		'active': true,
		'avoid_expensive_queries': false,
		'columns':
		{
			'instant_access':
			{
				'sys_user': ''
			},
			'whitelist_trigger':
			{
				'sys_user_group': ''
			},
		}
	};
	
	config['tables']['sc_task'] =
	{
		'scope': 'x_snc_datasilos',
		'active': true,
		'avoid_expensive_queries': false,
		'columns':
		{

				'sys_user': ''

			},
		}
	};
	
	return config;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-17 10:24:44</sys_created_on><sys_id>8073ee72db37fc904647dad1f396191d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DataSilosGetConfig</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DataSilos WORK IN PROGRESS" source="x_snc_datasilos">dafbffebdbb78450ba15a353059619eb</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DataSilos WORK IN PROGRESS">dafbffebdbb78450ba15a353059619eb</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8073ee72db37fc904647dad1f396191d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-17 10:24:50</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
